description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Help the king of BALATE Sir Bradimir, and his court wizard Nerdin, to defend their country by the wrath of ferocious legions of orcs coming for their life. Be ready to fight the orcs by throwing 'Balates' to them, to make them fall down to the ground.
description.short: Help the king of BALATE Sir Bradimir, and his court wizard Nerdin, to defend their country by the wrath of ferocious legions of orcs coming for their life. Be ready to fight the orcs by throwing 'Balates' to them, to make them fall down to the ground.
